mdRecord.dcterms:title: Beverly's Diner by K.C. Wilson and Jim Baker Front
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for Beverly's Diner by K.C. Wilson and Jim Baker. Director: Richard Rose. Costume Designer & Choreographer: Amanda Aldridge. Musical Supervision: Winston Clark. Musical Director: Jules Cohen. Scenic Designer: DaNeil Ettinger. Lighting Designer: David Friedl. Dramaturg: Joseph Kline. Sound Designer: Scott Koenig. Stage Manager: Connie M. Silver. Listed Musical Numbers: Maybe Tomorrow, Claudette, Rip it Up, Devoted to You, I Wonder if I Care As Much, When Will I be Loved, 'till I kissed ya, Poor Jenny, Let it Be Me, Bird Dog, Rip it Up (Reprise), Wake Up Little Susie, Ebony Eyes, Cathy's Clown, Walk Right Back, Be-Bop-A-Lula, All I Have to Do is Dream, Amazing Grace/I'll Fly Away, Bye Bye Love, Maybe Tomorrow (Reprise), Wake Up Little Susie/All I Have to do is Dream/Bird Dog (Medley). Actors include Jeffery Brocklin, John Fairlie. Percussionist: Todd Corcoran. Guitarist: David Baker. Setting: Beverly's Diner, Pigeon Forge, Tennessee.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
